45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Urwa b. Zubair reported that Hisham b. Hakim found a person (the ruler of Hims) who had been detaining some Nabateans in connection with the dues of Jizya. He said:What is this? I heard Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying: Allah would torment those persons who torment people in the world

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَعِيدِ الشَّدِيدِ لِمَنْ عَذَّبَ النَّاسَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ
chapter.eng-name: Stern Warning To One Who Torments People Unlawfully
